destinations.name: Val Thorens - France
destinations.subtitle: The youngest of all the big ski resorts in Europe
destinations.fullDescription: Every winter, Val Thorens and its teams of  professional and passionate people, do their utmost to provide holiday-makers with magical experiences. By sharing these moments they transmit their values, passions and their know-how. A common vision, 'LIVE UNITED' which has been written for 50 years, and which has only one goal: create together unique, festive, and sporting experiences. At 2300 metres above sea level, Val Thorens is commited to innovate and create unique memories. You won't find 'traditional' here, because Val Thorens has never done things like the others. Val Thorens owes this exceptional reputation above all to its location: Val Thorens has achieved the impossible by becoming the highest ski resort in Europe, and the largest ski area in the world with over 600 kilometres of runs. The resort was essentially created for one reason and one reason only: to offer the best skiing which you can't find anywhere else. Vincent Lalanne, director of Val Thorens

destinations.name: Val Gardena - Italy
destinations.subtitle: Visit Italy best ski resort
destinations.fullDescription: Val Gardena and the villages of Ortisei, Santa Cristina and Selva are well-known names on the international skiing stage, making them the perfect destination for people wanting to spend a winter holiday with plenty of outdoor leisure activities. The Sellaronda, the legendary skiing carousel around the Sella, and the connection to Alpe di Siusi and Dolomiti Superski (12 skiing areas and 1,200 km of slopes) can satisfy the needs of every skier, from beginners to pros. Five Alpine skiing schools and two mountaineering schools welcome enthusiasts of all ages every year and offer fun activities both on and off the slopes. Val Gardena also stands for high-quality food as well as art and culture.

destinations.name: Zermatt - Switzerland
destinations.subtitle: The village at the foot of the Matterhorn
destinations.fullDescription: Every year you rank Zermatt among the best ski resorts in Europe but it the first time that the Best ski resorts in Switzerland is on this European podium. You have also ranked it among the most beautiful ski resorts in Europe, best destinations to visit by train and among the most luxurious ski resorts. The snow sports resort of Zermatt - Matterhorn is one of the places you simply must have seen at least once in your life. Breath-taking Alpine panorama and 360 km of pistes attract ski fans, bon vivants and Alpinists. The village at the foot of the Matterhorn issurrounded by magnificent Alpine landscape. Covered in snow at 1,620 metres (the level of the train station), the village looks like something out of a fairy-tale. 360 kilometres of pistes, situated at heights between 1,620 and 3,883 metres both in Switzerland and in Italy, offer limitless and borderless skiing opportunities. 70 per cent of the slopes are on the glacier or can be snowed. Then there is Zermatt‚Äôs Snow Park, an absolute must for freestylers and snowboarders.

destinations.name: S√∂lden - Austria
destinations.subtitle: 35 mountain lifts with absolutely no lift lines.
destinations.fullDescription: This winter ski in complete safety in one of the best ski resorts in Europe. Skiers and snowboarders can choose from no less than 148 kilometres of perfectly groomed slopes for all levels and abilities, 35 mountain lifts with absolutely no lift lines. In √ñtztal's renowned skiing paradise the winter term already has three seasons made to measure for early winter fans, passionate endurance sportsmen and apr√®s-ski aficionados. Linked ski areas in the eternal ice The glacier slopes in the upper √ñtztal, towering high above the skiers village, offer perfect snow conditions already from early September. Of course, snow is also guaranteed between 1350 and 3340 metres above sea level from October through May - thanks to a top modern snow making system covering some 80 percent of all slopes.

destinations.name: Gdansk - Poland
destinations.subtitle: The Gda≈Ñsk Christmas Fair is considered to be one of the most beautiful in Poland
destinations.fullDescription: The amazing ambience of the Christmas Fair is mostly created by its unique and mood-setting scenery. The Three Wise Men, angels and saints look at you from Angel Mill, high above. You can ride a horse or take a spin on a fabulous Venetian carousel or find a moment of solace at the Holy Family Shrine. During the Fair, the streets of the historic heart of Gda≈Ñsk turn into a Christmas town. Yuletide decorations, stalls with remarkable products and an extensive artistic program ensure that everyone finds something for themselves here. The Fair  feature 155 stalls with unique gifts, decorations and treats. There is regional products based on carefully preserved family recipes: unique handicrafts, home decorations, natural cosmetics, warm winter accessories and spices to keep you warm.

1.name: Brad Davids
1.text: My wife and I decided to book our first trip with Destinations to the island of Bora Bora and specifically stay at the St. Regis Hotel as she‚Äôs always wanted to go there and stay in the over water bungalows. The pricing was way better than I expected and we have a butler for the week we are there over New Years thanks to our concierge. Chloe handled all the details including our flights, which I hate to do myself so I was happy that she took care of all the planning. Can‚Äôt wait for our trip!

1.name: Mariah Simpson
1.text: Fantastic company with a fantastic product and customer service. My wife and I love to travel, and of course SAVE MONEY!!! The company's customer service is excellent and the deals they get are amazing. We had an issue with one of our trips and customer service took care of it no problem, 5 star rating for this company and can't wait for our next vacation!!!

2.name: Brad Davids
2.text: Great Experience, this tour is the best option to know Abu Dhabi with a great guide and optimising the time. Very complete tour. The explanations from the guide have been useful and correct. Totally recommended.

2.name: Nicole Keith
2.text: I booked this company for a trip to Abu Dabi, trip was great , Zee the staff was very knowledgeable, patience, and took great pictures of everyone . Trip consisted of going to the presidencial palace, Sheik Zayed mushed and downtown. Great if you want to get to see beyond Dubai.

2.name: George Smith
2.text: Awesome tour üíØ Ian was our tour guide and was absolutely amazing, had us all laughing‚Ä¶if you are visiting Oahu, you need to check these guys out. 10 out of 10- do recommend ü§ôüèΩ

2.name: Amanda Susan
2.text: A great tour from start to finish! You will definitely enjoy all the stops! Ian was our tour guide and his knowledge and sense of humor added to the value of the tour!

3.name: Brad Davids
3.text: A great experience and our guide Gamal was so helpful and friendly. We loved it! Would recommend to anyone visiting Dubai.

3.name: Magda Zusanoff
3.text: We spent the day with Ray who did a wonderful job showing us the sights of Oahu. He went above and beyond what we expected, going out of his way to see that we had an enjoyable time, including some unique food experiences.

3.name: Magda Romanoff
3.text: Fabulous tour guide. Very knowledgeable, courteous and helpful. In addition to the island tour we requested, he took us to several local places we would not have known about. Ask for Ray

3.name: Pete Johnson
3.text: My wife and I had a stellar experience during our tour on the North Shore Beach Bus. Ian was our driver, and I'm so thankful he was. He just oozes charisma and personality, and will personally make sure you're having the time of your life. Seriously, if I had kids, I'd hit him up to be their Godfather. In addition to taking us to see amazing sights, Ian shared his depthful knowledge of the island and Hawaiian history. It wasn't just that he was knowledgeable, it's super clear that history matters to him. He's also on point with food recommendations, and I want to echo his reco to get the #8 at Fumis for lunch. 10/10 would recommend!

3.name: Brit Johnson
3.text: Our driver was very good fun and I enjoyed the trip very much. I'm just sorry that the only day I could go was a Monday so I did not get to hike to the falls. I love the ocean and very much enjoyed the beach and loved seeing the turtles while paddle boarding, A friend took a similar bus trip in the past and was the inspiration for this trip. I only had one full leisure day on Oahu and no car. Hope to be back again soon.

3.name: Marius Kolwski
3.text: I had a wonderful experience. Ian was entertaining, engaging, and had a wealth of knowledge about the island!

4.name: Brad Davids
4.text: Great tour! So glad we booked this and would not have been able to do any of it on our own in such a short amount of time. Punctual pick up. Comfortable bus. Our guide, Hassan, was very friendly and knowledgeable. He taught us so much about the culture and the sites we visited. Must do! Don‚Äôt skip this.

5.name: Mariah Simpson
5.text: Fantastic company with a fantastic product and customer service. My wife and I love to travel, and of course SAVE MONEY!!! The company's customer service is excellent and the deals they get are amazing. We had an issue with one of our trips and customer service took care of it no problem, 5 star rating for this company and can't wait for our next vacation!!!

5.text: I had a wonderful experience. Ian was entertaining, engaging, and had a wealth of knowledge about the island!

I love the ocean and very much enjoyed the beach and loved seeing the turtles while paddle boarding, A friend took a similar bus trip in the past and was the inspiration for this trip. I only had one full leisure day on Oahu and no car. Hope to be back again soon.
